doctor.name: Prof. Dr. S.A.M. Abdus Sabur
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases Specialist, Cardiovascular & Thoracic Surgeon
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. S.A.M. Abdus Sabur is a Cardiac Surgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, DTCD (DU), MRIT (Japan), MS (CVT). He is a Former Professor, Cardiothoracic & Vascular Surgery at National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Euro Medical Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. S.A.M. Abdus Sabur at Euro Medical Center, Pabna is 1st & 3rd Thursday of Each Month.

chamber.address: Beside JoyKali Bari, Hospital Road, Shalgaria, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Anwarul Islam (Sagar)
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Anwarul Islam (Sagar) is a General Surgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, MS, F.MAS, D.MAS, FICRS. He is a Consultant, Cardiac Surgery at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Assort Specialised Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Anwarul Islam (Sagar) at Assort Specialised Hospital, Pabna is 6pm to 9pm (Thursday), 9am to 3pm (Friday).

chamber.address: Beside Mujahid Club, Dhaka Road, East Shalgaria, Pabna
